files.patch:
@@ -2,1 +2,2 @@
-<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
+<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified"
+	xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
@@ -18,1 +19,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="classprefix" minOccurs="0">
+			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="classprefix"
+				minOccurs="0">
@@ -20,1 +22,3 @@
-					<xs:documentation>This is the prefix to use when generating event class names</xs:documentation>
+					<xs:documentation>This is the prefix to use when generating event
+						class names
+					</xs:documentation>
@@ -23,1 +27,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="allowtostring" minOccurs="0">
+			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="allowtostring"
+				minOccurs="0">
@@ -25,4 +30,6 @@
-					<xs:documentation> 
-						Will allow the recording of arrays and object parameters as Strings. This will cause toString to
-						be called for array elements and objects other than strings, which in turn can cause trouble if
-						the toString method is badly implemented. Use with care.
+					<xs:documentation>
+						Will allow the recording of arrays and object
+						parameters as Strings. This will cause toString to be called for
+						array elements and objects other than strings, which in turn can
+						cause trouble if the toString method is badly implemented. Use
+						with care.
@@ -32,1 +39,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="allowconverter" minOccurs="0">
+			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="allowconverter"
+				minOccurs="0">
@@ -35,1 +43,2 @@
-						Allows converters to be used. If a converter is badly implemented, you are on your own.
+						Allows converters to be used. If a converter is
+						badly implemented, you are on your own.
@@ -39,1 +48,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="enabledefaultconverters" minOccurs="0">
+			<xs:element type="xs:boolean"
+				name="enabledefaultconverters" minOccurs="0">
@@ -42,1 +52,2 @@
-						Enables a set of pre-packaged converters, converting some commonly found types to Strings.
+						Enables a set of pre-packaged converters,
+						converting some commonly found types to Strings.
@@ -46,1 +57,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="emitonexception" minOccurs="0">
+			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="emitonexception"
+				minOccurs="0">
@@ -49,1 +61,2 @@
-						Causes events to only be emitted if the instrumented method throws an exception
+						Causes events to only be emitted if the
+						instrumented method throws an exception
@@ -58,1 +71,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="eventType" name="event" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="eventType" name="event"
+				maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" />
@@ -67,1 +81,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -69,1 +84,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="stacktrace" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="xs:boolean" name="stacktrace"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -71,1 +87,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="locationType" name="location" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="locationType" name="location"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -79,1 +96,3 @@
-			<xs:documentation>the fully qualified class name (FQCN) of the class to be transformed</xs:documentation>
+			<xs:documentation>the fully qualified class name (FQCN) of the class
+				to be transformed
+			</xs:documentation>
@@ -82,1 +101,2 @@
-			<xs:pattern value="([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*\.)*([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)" />
+			<xs:pattern
+				value="([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*\.)*([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)" />
@@ -91,2 +111,4 @@
-			<xs:element type="parametersType" name="parameters" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="returnValueType" name="returnvalue" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="parametersType" name="parameters"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="returnValueType" name="returnvalue"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -105,1 +127,2 @@
-			<xs:documentation>see ยง4.3.3 in Java Virtual Machine Specification</xs:documentation>
+			<xs:documentation>see ยง4.3.3 in Java Virtual Machine Specification
+			</xs:documentation>
@@ -108,1 +131,2 @@
-			<xs:pattern value="\((\[*([BCDFIJSZ]|L([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/)*[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*;))*\)(V|\[*([BCDFIJSZ]|L([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/)*[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*;))" />
+			<xs:pattern
+				value="\((\[*([BCDFIJSZ]|L([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/)*[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*;))*\)(V|\[*([BCDFIJSZ]|L([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/)*[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*;))" />
@@ -118,1 +142,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="parameterType" name="parameter" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="parameterType" name="parameter"
+				maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" />
@@ -125,4 +150,8 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="contentTypeType" name="contenttype" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="relationKeyType" name="relationkey" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="converterType" name="converter" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="contentTypeType" name="contenttype"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="relationKeyType" name="relationkey"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="converterDefinition" name="converter"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -130,1 +159,2 @@
-		<xs:attribute type="xs:nonNegativeInteger" name="index" use="required" />
+		<xs:attribute type="xs:nonNegativeInteger" name="index"
+			use="required" />
@@ -135,1 +165,2 @@
-			<xs:documentation>see com.oracle.jrockit.jfr.ContentType</xs:documentation>
+			<xs:documentation>see com.oracle.jrockit.jfr.ContentType
+			</xs:documentation>
@@ -157,1 +188,2 @@
-				a unique URI signifying a relationship between different events based on the values of specific
+				a unique URI signifying a relationship between
+				different events based on the values of specific
@@ -164,1 +196,1 @@
-	<xs:simpleType name="converterType">
+	<xs:simpleType name="converterDefinition">
@@ -166,1 +198,4 @@
-			<xs:documentation>the fully qualified class name (FQCN) of the converter used</xs:documentation>
+			<xs:documentation>either the fully qualified class name (FQCN) of the
+				converter used, or the FQN followed by .method and the formal
+				descriptor.
+			</xs:documentation>
@@ -168,1 +203,5 @@
-		<xs:restriction base="classType" />
+		<xs:restriction base="xs:normalizedString">
+			<xs:whiteSpace value="collapse" />
+			<xs:pattern
+				value="([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*\.)+([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]+)(\((\[*([BCDFIJSZ]|L([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/)*[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*;))*\)(V|\[*([BCDFIJSZ]|L([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*/)*[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*;)))?" />
+		</xs:restriction>
@@ -173,1 +212,2 @@
-			<xs:documentation>This will only work if we allow toString</xs:documentation>
+			<xs:documentation>This will only work if we allow toString
+			</xs:documentation>
@@ -177,4 +217,8 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="contentTypeType" name="contenttype" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="relationKeyType" name="relationkey" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="converterType" name="converter" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="contentTypeType" name="contenttype"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="relationKeyType" name="relationkey"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="converterDefinition" name="converter"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -205,1 +249,2 @@
-			<xs:element type="fieldType" name="field" maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="fieldType" name="field"
+				maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" />
@@ -213,4 +258,8 @@
-			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="contentTypeType" name="contenttype" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="relationKeyType" name="relationkey" minOccurs="0" />
-			<xs:element type="converterType" name="converter" minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="xs:string" name="description"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="contentTypeType" name="contenttype"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="relationKeyType" name="relationkey"
+				minOccurs="0" />
+			<xs:element type="converterDefinition" name="converter"
+				minOccurs="0" />
@@ -223,1 +272,2 @@
-				an expression in a subset of primary expressions (see ยง15.8 in Java Language Specification) to be
+				an expression in a subset of primary expressions
+				(see ยง15.8 in Java Language Specification) to be
@@ -228,1 +278,2 @@
-			<xs:pattern value="([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*\.)*([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)(\.[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z_$]*)*" />
+			<xs:pattern
+				value="([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*\.)*([a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*)(\.[a-zA-Z_$][a-zA-Z_$]*)*" />
